thread.title: HP: Mercury plummets under subzero or in minus
thread.title_full: HP: Mercury plummets under subzero or in minus

author: Uniindia News Service
title: HP: Mercury plummets under subzero or in minus
text: States Â» NorthPosted at: Dec 13 2024 2:12PM HP: Mercury plummets under subzero or in minusShimla, Dec 13 (UNI) The cold wave intensified in the state as the mercury of 15 places in Himachal Pradesh plummeted under subzero or in minus. According to the Indian Meteorological Department, the minimum temperature of Una was six degrees lower than that of Shimla. Shimla was 4.4 degrees and Una minus 0.4 on Friday.Minimum temperatures of Tabo and Keylong in Lahaul Spiti are minus 7.5 degrees each, Kukukseri minus 7.1, and above 3.5 degrees of yesterday, Kalpa in Kinnaur minus 5.2 degrees, Samdhu four degrees, Berthin in Bilaspur minus 1.5 degrees, Narkanda in Shimla and Reckong-peo minus 1.2, Sundernagar (Mandi) minus 0.1, Bhuntar airport and Solan minus 0.5 each, tourist resort Manali minus 0.2, Seobagh minus 0.1 and Bajoura minus 0.6, Hamirpur minus 0.4, Bharmour minus 0.5, and Bilaspur and Mandi one degree.Minimum temperature of Chamba 1.5 degrees; Kangra 2 degrees, Dharmshala 3.5; Nahan in Sirmour 6.7 degrees and Pontasahib 8 degrees.It was mainly dry and pleasant in the day today; however, moderate fog reduced visibility up to 400 m in Mandi district.The Met Office forecast mainly dry weather in the next 24 hrs.UNI ML ARNTags: #HP: Mercury plummets under subzero or in minus
